Bentley, Richard, d. 1697. Dissertation upon the epistles of Phalaris, Themistocles, Socrates, Euripides; &c. and fables of Æsop.

notesStmt.note: "Additions to the second edition of Mr. Wotton's reflections upon ancient and modern learning" has separate pagination. "Dissertation upon the epistles" has special t.p. with imprint: London, Printed by J. Leake for Peter Buck, MDCXCVII, and separate pagination.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
